linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 or higher required
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version El Capitan 10.11+ or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: The Plague Doctor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
